title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama-2, Code-Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other GGUF models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that lets you swap Ollama models into any chain or agent.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) comparable to ChatGPT; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and conversation persistence.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub.

title: open-webui
summary: Community fork of ollama-webui with plugins, voice chat, and pipeline extensions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team for retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, multimodal, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that builds Ollama with optional CUDA and ROCm support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spin up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into a server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Socket-mode for secure internal Q&A with Ollama models.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app for starting/stopping Ollama and switching models.
